room_title: Escape room "Abandoned House" by Brainstorm Escape Room Bonita Springs in Fort Myers
room_description: You are part of a local private investigation team looking into a series of murders. A member of your team followed a lead to an abandoned house. That was days ago, and no one has heard from him since. Your team goes to investigate, and he is nowhere to be found but there is evidence he is still there. When you try to leave to call for help you discover you have been locked in. You must find another way to escapeâ€¦.You have 60 minutes Good Luck!
